TopicTitle: [WIP][1.3.1] North Kerbin Dynamics - Nuclear Bombs and Heavy Ordnance Pack (and other things) v0.84b

Articles.Content:
that'll be changed, honestly it was laziness but I'm going to turn it into DDS soon enough

There is an easy peogram called DDSforKSP that will do it for you if you just select the folder has a GUI and everything

by that I mean, yeah I'll make it. Considering the votes, next update will consist of large guns and large missiles, which that will be included.

As for everyone else, make requests based on those 2 categories!

Gsh-23-2 turret rotates too slow, at 15 degrees per second. Makes it almost unusable.

Sashan: That's actually faster than most IRL turrets rotate. Consider it a compromise between realism and gameplay- having KSP become War Thunder wouldn't be as much fun.

Also: Y'all need to be indexed on CKAN.

Edited October 9, 2015 by Kagame
CKAN plox.
The GSh is a point defense weapon, though, and I know from personal experience that its counterpart the USN's Phalanx CIWS slews at a far, far higher rate than 15 deg/s.

Sashan: That's actually faster than most IRL turrets rotate. Consider it a compromise between realism and gameplay- having KSP become War Thunder wouldn't be as much fun.

Well, old ones - maybe, but modern AA guns rotate at up to 90 deg/sec. Tank ones also rotate fast, or stabilisation won't work. Also, try to google some videos with Apache and see turret's rotation speed.
Hey when using the SCUD and artillery missiles, everything just arcs into the ground if it targets further than about 20km or so, anyone know why, if there's a fix, or if this will be patched?

Hey when using the SCUD and artillery missiles, everything just arcs into the ground if it targets further than about 20km or so, anyone know why, if there's a fix, or if this will be patched?
